cache_inode_renew_entry.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00097 #include "log_functions.h"

00109  
00127 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_renew_entry( cache_entry_t        * pentry, 
00128                                               fsal_attrib_list_t   * pattr, 
00129                                               hash_table_t         * ht,
00130                                               cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00131                                               fsal_op_context_t    * pcontext, 
00132                                               cache_inode_status_t * pstatus )
00133 {
00134   fsal_handle_t     * pfsal_handle = NULL ;
00135   fsal_status_t       fsal_status ;
00136   fsal_attrib_list_t  object_attributes ;
00137   fsal_path_t         link_content ;
00138   time_t              current_time = time( NULL ) ;
00139   time_t              entry_time = pentry->internal_md.refresh_time ;
00140 
00141   /* If we do nothing (no expiration) then everything is all right */
00142   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ; 
00143 
00144 #ifdef _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00145   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, 
00146                      "Entry=%p, type=%d, current=%d, read=%d, refresh=%d, alloc=%d",
00147                      pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, current_time, 
00148                      pentry->internal_md.read_time, pentry->internal_md.refresh_time,
00149                      pentry->internal_md.alloc_time ) ;
00150 #endif
00151 
00152   /* An entry that is a regular file with an associated File Content Entry won't
00153    * expire until data exists in File Content Cache, to avoid attributes incoherency */
00154 
00155   /* @todo: BUGAZOMEU: I got serious doubts on the following blocks: possible trouble if using data caching */
00156   if( pentry->internal_md.type == REGULAR_FILE &&
00157       pentry->object.file.pentry_content != NULL )
00158     {
00159       /* Successfull exit without having nothing to do ... */
00160 
00161       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG,
00162                          "Entry %p is a REGULAR_FILE with associated data cached %p, no expiration", 
00163                          pentry, pentry->object.file.pentry_content ) ;
00164       
00165       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ; 
00166       return *pstatus ;
00167     }
00168   
00169   /* Do we use getattr/mtime checking */
00170   if( pclient->getattr_dir_invalidation &&
00171       pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING &&
00172       FSAL_TEST_MASK(  pclient->attrmask , FSAL_ATTR_MTIME ) &&
00173       pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir == CACHE_INODE_YES )  
00174     {
00175         /* This checking is to be done ... */
00176         pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00177 
00178         /* Call FSAL to get the attributes */
00179         object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ;
00180 
00181         fsal_status = FSAL_getattrs( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &object_attributes ) ;
00182 
00183         if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00184         {
00185           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00186 
00187           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00188            {
00189                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00190 
00191                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00192 
00193                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00194                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00195         
00196                *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00197            }
00198           /* stat */
00199           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00200 
00201           return *pstatus ;
00202         }
00203 
00204 #ifdef  _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00205       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG,
00206                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Cached Time=%d, FSAL Time=%d",  
00207                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type,
00208                          pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds,
00209                          object_attributes.mtime.seconds ) ;
00210 #endif
00211  
00212         /* Compare the FSAL mtime and the cached mtime */
00213         if( pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds < object_attributes.mtime.seconds )
00214           {
00215              /* Cached directory content is obsolete, it must be renewed */
00216               pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes = object_attributes ;
00217 
00218 
00219              /* Return the attributes as set */
00220              if( pattr != NULL )
00221                 *pattr = object_attributes ;
00222 
00223              /* Set the directory content as "to be renewed" */
00224              /* Next call to cache_inode_readdir will repopulate the dirent array */
00225              pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir = CACHE_INODE_RENEW_NEEDED ;
00226 
00227             /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00228             pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00229     
00230             DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG,
00231                               "cached directory content for entry %p must be renewed, due to getattr mismatch", pentry ) ;
00232          
00233           } /* if( pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime < object_attributes.asked_attributes.mtime ) */
00234     } /* if( pclient->getattr_dir_invalidation && ... */
00235     
00236   /* Check for dir content expiration */
00237   if( pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING                    &&
00238       pclient->grace_period_dirent != 0                            &&
00239       pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir == CACHE_INODE_YES &&
00240       ( current_time - entry_time > pclient->grace_period_dirent ) )
00241     {
00242       /* stat */
00243       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00244       
00245       /* Log */
00246 #ifdef  _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00247       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, 
00248                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_dirent=%d", 
00249                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00250                          entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_dirent ) ;
00251       
00252       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, 
00253                          "cached directory entries for entry %p must be renewed", pentry ) ;
00254 #endif
00255     
00256       /* Do the getattr if it had not being done before */
00257       if( pfsal_handle == NULL )
00258        {  
00259           pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00260       
00261           /* Call FSAL to get the attributes */
00262           object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ;
00263       
00264           fsal_status = FSAL_getattrs( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &object_attributes ) ;
00265       
00266           if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00267             {
00268               *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00269           
00270               /* stat */
00271               pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00272 
00273               if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00274                 {
00275                      cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00276 
00277                      DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00278 
00279                      if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00280                          DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00281 
00282                     *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00283                 }
00284  
00285               return *pstatus ;
00286             }
00287         } 
00288 
00289       pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes = object_attributes ;
00290        
00291       /* Return the attributes as set */
00292       if( pattr != NULL )
00293         *pattr = object_attributes ;
00294       
00295       /* Set the directory content as "to be renewed" */
00296       /* Next call to cache_inode_readdir will repopulate the dirent array */
00297       pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir = CACHE_INODE_RENEW_NEEDED ;
00298 
00299       /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00300       pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00301 
00302     } /* if( pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING && ... */
00303         
00304     /* if the directory has not been readdir, only update its attributes */
00305         
00306     else if ( pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING                    &&
00307               pclient->grace_period_attr != 0                              &&
00308               pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir != CACHE_INODE_YES &&
00309               ( current_time - entry_time > pclient->grace_period_attr ) )
00310     {
00311       /* stat */
00312       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00313       
00314       /* Log */
00315 #ifdef  _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00316       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00317                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_dirent=%d", 
00318                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00319                          entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_dirent ) ;
00320       
00321       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00322                          "cached directory entries for entry %p must be renewed", pentry ) ;
00323 #endif
00324 
00325       
00326       pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00327       
00328       /* Call FSAL to get the attributes */
00329       object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ;
00330       
00331       fsal_status = FSAL_getattrs( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &object_attributes ) ;
00332       
00333       if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00334         {
00335           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00336           
00337           /* stat */
00338           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00339          
00340           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00341            {
00342                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00343 
00344                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00345 
00346                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00347                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00348 
00349                 *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00350            }
00351  
00352           return *pstatus ;
00353         }
00354       
00355       pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes = object_attributes ;
00356       
00357       /* Return the attributes as set */
00358       if( pattr != NULL )
00359         *pattr = object_attributes ;
00360 
00361       /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00362       pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00363 
00364     } /* else if( pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING && ... */
00365     
00366   /* Check for attributes expiration in other cases*/
00367     
00368   else if(  pentry->internal_md.type   != DIR_CONTINUE    &&
00369             pentry->internal_md.type   != DIR_BEGINNING   &&       
00370             pclient->grace_period_attr != 0               && 
00371             ( current_time - entry_time > pclient->grace_period_attr ) )
00372     {
00373       /* stat */
00374       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00375 
00376       /* Log */
00377       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00378                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_attr=%d", 
00379                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00380                          entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_attr ) ;
00381       
00382       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00383                          "Attributes for entry %p must be renewed", pentry ) ;
00384       
00385       switch( pentry->internal_md.type )
00386         {
00387         case REGULAR_FILE:
00388           pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.file.handle ;
00389           break ;
00390           
00391         case SYMBOLIC_LINK:
00392           pfsal_handle  = &pentry->object.symlink.handle ;
00393           break ;
00394           
00395         case SOCKET_FILE:
00396         case FIFO_FILE:
00397         case CHARACTER_FILE:
00398         case BLOCK_FILE:
00399           pfsal_handle  = &pentry->object.special_obj.handle ;
00400           break ;          
00401         }
00402       
00403       /* Call FSAL to get the attributes */
00404       object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ; 
00405       fsal_status = FSAL_getattrs( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &object_attributes ) ;
00406       if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00407         {
00408           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00409           
00410           /* stat */
00411           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00412          
00413           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00414            {
00415                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00416 
00417                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00418 
00419                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00420                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00421 
00422                *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00423            }
00424  
00425           return *pstatus ;
00426         }
00427       
00428       /* Keep the new attribute in cache */
00429       switch( pentry->internal_md.type )
00430         {
00431         case REGULAR_FILE:
00432           pentry->object.file.attributes = object_attributes ;
00433           break ;
00434           
00435         case SYMBOLIC_LINK:
00436           pentry->object.symlink.attributes = object_attributes ;
00437           break ;
00438           
00439         case SOCKET_FILE:
00440         case FIFO_FILE:
00441         case CHARACTER_FILE:
00442         case BLOCK_FILE:
00443           pentry->object.special_obj.attributes = object_attributes;
00444           break ;          
00445         }
00446       
00447       /* Return the attributes as set */
00448       if( pattr != NULL )
00449         *pattr = object_attributes ;
00450 
00451       /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00452       pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00453       
00454     } /* if(  pentry->internal_md.type   != DIR_CONTINUE && ... */
00455     
00456   /* Check for link content expiration */
00457   if( pentry->internal_md.type == SYMBOLIC_LINK &&
00458       pclient->grace_period_link != 0           &&
00459       ( current_time - entry_time  > pclient->grace_period_link ) )
00460     {
00461       pfsal_handle  = &pentry->object.symlink.handle ;
00462 
00463       /* TMP DEBUG */
00464        DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_link=%d", 
00465                    pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00466                    entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_link ) ;
00467 
00468       /* Log */
00469       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00470                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_link=%d", 
00471                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00472                          entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_link ) ;
00473       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00474                          "cached link content for entry %p must be renewed", pentry ) ;
00475 
00476       FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( object_attributes.asked_attributes ) ;
00477       FSAL_SET_MASK( object_attributes.asked_attributes, pclient->attrmask ) ;
00478 
00479 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00480       fsal_status = MFSL_readlink( &pentry->mobject, pcontext, &pclient->mfsl_context, &link_content, &object_attributes  ) ;
00481 #else
00482       fsal_status = FSAL_readlink( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &link_content, &object_attributes  ) ;
00483 #endif
00484       if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00485         { 
00486           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ; 
00487           /* stats */
00488           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00489          
00490           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00491            {
00492                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00493 
00494                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00495 
00496                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00497                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00498         
00499                *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00500            }
00501  
00502         }
00503       else
00504         {
00505           fsal_status = FSAL_pathcpy( &pentry->object.symlink.content, &link_content ) ;
00506           if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00507             {
00508               *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00509                /* stats */
00510               pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;            
00511             }
00512         }
00513 
00514       /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00515       pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00516 
00517     } /* if( pentry->internal_md.type == SYMBOLIC_LINK && ... */
00518   
00519   
00520   return *pstatus ;
00521 } /* cache_inode_renew_entry */
